data.title: Prairie Street Brewing Company
data.meta_description: Prairie Street Brewing Co. offers world-class beer handcrafted locally in a range of styles. Every glass poured is consistently delicious. The food menu reflects the change of the seasons and the availability of the freshest ingredients.
data.meta_site_name: Prairie Street Brewing Company - Local Brewery and Event Venue in Downtown Rockford
data.text:
Dinner on the Dock

May 9 – August 29

5–10 p.m. Food + Beer

6–9 p.m. Live Music

Free admission (all ages)

Public seating: first come, first serve

Table reservations available; see details below.

Come Together!

Come Together at Dinner on the Dock! The backdrop of the scenic Rock River & downtown Rockford creates a unique and vivacious gathering where Rockford comes together to enjoy the region’s best musical acts. DOD is THE event of the summer for the Rockford metro area and we couldn’t be more excited about the 2024 season. See you there!

The 2024 Dinner on the Dock Music Series is presented by Prairie Street Brewing Co. This event offers guests great food, locally brewed craft beer, and locally and nationally recognized musical acts! Come by car or boat and relax on the dock with us every Thursday night in beautiful downtown Rockford.

Kicking off our 2024 Dinner on the Dock lineup is Three Good Men! Three Good Men specializing in great dance music that is popular with all ages and audiences. At every performance you’re likely to hear classic songs spanning several decades of music.

Table Reservations:

We are making reserving a table easier than ever!

A server for beverages

All reservable tables have umbrellas

A VIP appetizer menu – you can preorder when making your reservation or place your order after you check-in

Please check-in for your reservation at the south side of the dock at the hostess stand.

Pricing: Tables for two people to six people are available. Prices start at $25 and go up to $90.

Table reservations close at 11:59 p.m. the Wednesday before each event.

Appetizer options close at 6 p.m. the Tuesday before each event, but you can also place your order with your server when you arrive.

Boat Slip Reservations:

Lock in your boat slip and secure your prime spot and enjoy the best riverside entertainment Rockford has to offer!

Reserved boat parking from 11 a.m. on your reservation day and will be held until 8 p.m. that evening

Exclusive pre-order appetizer menu – food will be served in to-go containers

Pricing: $40 per slip

Boat slip reservations close at 11:59 p.m. the Wednesday before each event.

Slip is reserved starting at 11am the date you select and will be held until 8pm the same day.

No overnight boat parking.

Reserved spots are for Dinner on the Dock only.

Table Reservation Policy

Cancellation policy

Full refunds are available up to two weeks before the event.

Within two weeks of the event, sorry. We cannot offer refunds but we can transfer your reservation to another DOD event, as long as there is availability.

If there is no availability or the season is coming to an end, we will issue a gift card in the amount of your reservation.

Rain Dates

Unfortunately, weather happens! With enough notice, we reserve the right to move Dinner on the Dock inside Prairie Street. If we do, your reservation will stand and we will have a prime table reserved for you inside.

If the event is canceled with less than 24 hours notice, we will work with you to reschedule your reservation to a later date.

If there is no availability or the season is coming to an end, we will issue a gift card in the amount of your reservation.

If the event gets canceled after 6:00 p.m. and the band has already started, sorry. We cannot offer any refunds.

Reservation adjustments or mistakes

If you need to change your reservation or made a mistake, notify us within 24 hours of making the reservations and we will do our best to accommodate.

If you need to change your reservation or made a mistake after the 24 hour period and there is more than two weeks until your reservation, please call (815) 277-9427 or email us at (events@psbrewingco.com) and let us know and we will do our best to accommodate your adjustment.
